entry.title: bip48 proposal
entry.summary: The email is a proposal from Fontaine to the Bitcoin-dev community, suggesting the creation of bip48 as a means of documenting modern multi-sig derivations. The proposal takes inspiration from bip44 and includes a rough draft of the proposed bip. The email also includes a link to a GitHub repository where the bip can be found instead of a static link. The email was sent using ProtonMail for added security.
